CustomField.description: Green: EB is aware and aligned & Inside 1 month post-scan || Yellow: EB is aware and aligned & Inside 3 Months post-scan || Red: EB is aware, but Unclear timeline or Outside 3 Months
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: EB is aware and aligned & Inside 1 month post-scan || Yellow: EB is aware and aligned & Inside 3 Months post-scan || Red: EB is aware, but Unclear timeline or Outside 3 Months
CustomField.label: Timeframe
